question: How many inhabitants approximately live in the urban area of Jihlava, Czech Republic as of the most recent records?
asked_question_translated: Quantos habitantes vivem aproximadamente na área urbana de Jihlava, na República Checa, de acordo com os registos mais recentes?
answer: Aproximadamente 50.000 habitantes vivem na área urbana de Jihlava, na República Checa, de acordo com os registos mais recentes.
answer_translated_eng: Approximately 50,000 inhabitants live in the urban area of Jihlava in the Czech Republic, according to the most recent records.
